item.title: I-80 East - Exits 185 and 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-89 North/CA-267/Sierraville/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: End CA-267 South at CA-28
item.description: End CA-267 south at CA-28 in Kings Beach. Turn right for CA-28 west to Tahoe City; turn left for CA-28 east to Stateline.

item.title: End CA-267 South at CA-28
item.description: End CA-267 south at CA-28 in Kings Beach.

item.title: CA-267 South - Brockway Summit
item.description: CA-267 South - Brockway Summit (Elevation 7179 Feet). Brockway Summit divides the Truckee area from the Tahoe Basin. CA-267 south quickly descends into Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-267 South at Northstar Road
item.description: CA-267 South at Northstar Road. Turn right for Northstar-At-Tahoe Ski Area and for (Lake Tahoe) Watercraft Inspection. All watercraft launching in Lake Tahoe need to be inspected prior to launching.

item.title: CA-267 South at Martis Creek Lake Jct.
item.description: CA-267 south at Martis Creek Lake Jct. Turn left for Martis Creek Lake Recreation Area, and Waddle Ranch Access. The ski slopes of Northstar-At-Tahoe are visible on the upper right side of the picture.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B Offramp at CA-89/CA-267
item.description: I-80 east Exit 188B offramp at CA-89/CA-267 junction. Turn left for CA-89 north to Sierraville. Turn right for CA-267 south to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: Begin CA-267 East at I-80
item.description: Begin CA-267 east at I-80. Turn right for I-80 east to Reno (Exit 188B); continue ahead for CA-267 east to Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Advanced for Exit 188B
item.description: Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-267/North Lake Tahoe. Approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 south, Lake Tahoe. Both CA-89 and CA-267 connect Truckee with the north shore of Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188A and Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 188A - Truckee and approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-89/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 East Advanced Signage for CA-267
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 185 - CA-89 South/Lake Tahoe. Advanced signage for Exit 188B - CA-267/North Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Exits 188A and 188B
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 188A - Truckee and approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 188B - CA-89/Sierraville/CA-267/Lake Tahoe

item.title: I-80 West Exit 188
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 188, CA-267/CA-89 North/Lake Tahoe/Sierraville, 1 mile.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 188
item.description: I-80 west at CA-89 North/CA-267 at Exit 188 on I-80 west, Truckee.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 188A
item.description: Approaching CA-89/CA-267 Exit on I-80 East. This was taken during the construction for the new interchange resulting in Exits 188AB.
